title: Peanut Butter Protein Balls

ingredients.content: 100 g peanuts, roasted, unsalted, plus 12 peanuts for garnish

preparations.content: Place peanuts in mixing bowl and chop <b>8 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add vanilla extract, honey, protein powder and peanut butter then mix <b>30 sec//speed 2<b>. Roll into 12 walnut sized balls and place a peanut on top.
Cool in fridge for at least 30 minutes. Serve chilled.

hintsAndTricks: Make your own homemade peanut butter ready to use in this recipe for even more satisfaction!
Less honey will be needed if the protein powder is sweetened.

This is an inexpensive way of producing a protein ball which is almost identical to a commercially available product but for less than ⅛ of the price. Protein powder and peanuts combine with a small amount of carbohydrates to create these delicious little protein balls.
